page.title: 09A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: In Madeley the milkman comes every day to my doorstep and delivers the milk.I know it is the milkman because when I am in bed I can hear the bottles banging together.When I hear him I get out of bed and get my clothes on,and then have my breakfast.The cereal I like is "Frosties" with milk.After breakfast I clean my teeth then go to school.On Mondays we have P.E.,then we do some number work and writing. I have school dinner.I wash my hands and we line up then go down to the hall.My favourite dinner is fish fingers,chips and peas,with a bun and some orange juice for pudding. After dinner I go out to play.When the bell rings we all go into school and our dinner lady reads us a story.We do some more work before we go home.When I get home I play with my Lego then watch television downstairs before bed
